Package hr.fer.zemris.webapps.webapp_baza

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionSetterFilter
    Intercepts a request and ensures that the connection from a DataSource will be available for the requested servlet.
    ErrorUtil
    Utility class for displaying error messages to the user.
    Initialization
    Initializes the web application.
    PollsServlet
    Obtains available polls and renders links for each one.
    VotingGraphicServlet
    Creates a PNG image containing a pie chart with voting results for a poll whose ID is received as a parameter.
    VotingResultsServlet
    Obtains the results of voting for a poll whose ID is received as a parameter and displays them.
    VotingServlet
    Obtains available options for a poll whose ID number is received as a parameter and renders a link for voting on each option.
    VotingVoteServlet
    Registers a single vote for an option whose ID is received as a parameter and calls the servlet responsible for displaying results.
    VotingXLSServlet
    Creates a Microsoft Excel (XLS) document containing voting results for a poll whose ID is received as a parameter.
